== The Ubuntu Global Jam Events ==

== Confirmed Events ==

This is the rock and roll list of events. Be sure to add yours!

* <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/events/global/1443/detail/|Ubuntu Global Jam events in the LoCo Directory]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/events/global/1901/detail/]]</nowiki>

=== How to add your event ===

Adding a new Ubuntu Global Jam event in the !LoCo Directory is really easy: it should not take you more than two minutes to do it and it will give more visibility to your !LoCo and help you with the planning. Here's how to do it:

# Go to the <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/events/global/1443/detail/|Ubuntu Global Jam event]]</nowiki> in the !LoCo Directory
# <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/openid/login?next=/events/global/1443/detail/|Log in]]</nowiki> to the !LoCo Directory with your Launchpad ID
# <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/events/team/add/?global_event_id=1443|Add your team's event]]</nowiki>

That's it, you're now part of the rocking list of !LoCos running an Ubuntu Global Jam!
